channel.title: Some previews of my hard dance tracks
channel.description:
I've seen some people share their musical projects, so I'll share some previews too.
[b]Uplifting (Hard Dance)[/b] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=22PDUX4tFvk]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=22PDUX4tFvk[/url]
[b]Club Sound (Hard Dance)[/b] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A0ixINz3LSE]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A0ixINz3LSE[/url]
Make sure you listen them with 720p. There are also some other older previews in my channel.

item.title: Some previews of my hard dance tracks
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

It’s good, but it’s not too interesting. It needs more tension and release.
Work on building up and creating tension in the songs, finally to release with huge climactic synth/bass drops.

In almost any type of music, tension and release is essential.

Read full topic
item.source: Some previews of my hard dance tracks

item.title: Some previews of my hard dance tracks
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“The Enforcer, post:5, topic:382706”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=478496.msg3502551#msg3502551 date=1297855114]

I’ve seen some people share their musical projects, so I’ll share some previews too.

Uplifting (Hard Dance)
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=22PDUX4tFvk

Club Sound (Hard Dance)
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A0ixINz3LSE

Make sure you listen them with 720p. There are also some other older previews in my channel.

Uplifting ended too early. For a hard dance song it seems like that entire part was only an intro. I expected the beat to continue except become more excited and more beats per second.

Club Sound ended too early as well. It didn’t even fade out like the previous song did. I still expected the song to go on longer than it did as well.
[/quote]

These are just previews, not full tracks. They only have the intro and the first part of the climax.[/quote]

They may be previews but I’m just critiquing them as if they were finished songs. It will help you know which way you need to go to fulfill a good hard dance song. IMO they are good, just not long enough yet.

Read full topic
item.source: Some previews of my hard dance tracks
